des:
Close Companion is the IoT platform for products manufactured by Open Classroom Team. By using Close Companion, you can monitor and control many IoT devices, such as lights, fans, switchs, outlets... in your smart home or smart office. This skill helps you monitor and control your Close Companion devices through Alexa app or Amazon Echo speakers.

To get started:
- Follow the accompanying manual to get a Close Companion account and register your devices. The way to register varies with each kind of device.
- In your Alexa app, search the 'Close Companion' skill and select the 'Enable to use' button to link your Close Companion account and discover your devices. The registered compatible devices will show up in the 'Devices' section.

Assume you have registered your smart light bulb as the name 'Light' and your smart fan as the name 'Fan', you can say the following:
- Alexa, turn on the light
- Alexa, turn off the fan
- Alexa, dim the light by 10 percent

Please contact us at https://openclassroomteam.com/contact if you have any problems with this skill.
